name: RoadFromHell
description:
A little witch called Berna accidentally goes to hell, separated from her dog. She tries to reach heaven by defeating monsters while being cursed by the Archangel. Defying heaven's will is no easy job, what motivates her is knowing that Maya is waiting for her to come back.

Every 10 seconds, our character's curse activates and gives a random buff or debuff. You may or may not defeat the monsters blocking your way. All of this will be your choice. Our game could be challenging for some, do you have the power to defy your fate?

CONTROLS

Jump - Double Jump/W , Move /A-D, Ranged Attack/ Left Click
